A Healthy Way of Life

Do you laugh every day? Most people do.

Laughter is good for you. Why? For one thing, laughter is good exercise.
When you laugh, you exercise many muscles in your body. One hundred
laughs equal ten minutes of running. When you laugh, you also breathe
deeply. This helps you relax. That's good for you, too.

In English, people say that laughter is the best medicine. Some think that
laughter helps sick people get well. Do you think so?
